title: MDK配置失败，求助
author: ~~末影少女-_-
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ~~末影少女-_- 于 2018-7-15 19:46 编辑 

:extractUserdev (Thread[Daemon worker,5,main]) started.
:extractUserdev
Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .2-14.23.4.2705.pom
Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .4.2705-userdev.jar
Executing task ':extractUserdev' (up-to-date check took 3 mins 17.43 secs) due to:
  No history is available.
F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft\net\minecraftforge\forge\1.12.2-14.23.4.2705\userdev\dev.json could not be parsed
:extractUserdev FAILED
:extractUserdev (Thread[Daemon worker,5,main]) completed. Took 3 mins 17.611 secs.

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':extractUserdev'.
> java.io.FileNotFoundException: Inherited json file (1.12.2) not found! Maybe you are running in offline mode?

一直卡在这个问题上，求助

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
似乎是一个json文件不完整导致的。
删除这个文件: F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft\net\minecraftforge\forge\1.12.2-14.23.4.2705\userdev\dev.json 试试

replies.author: ~~末影少女-_-
replies.txt_content:
Lss233 发表于 2018-7-15 20:33
似乎是一个json文件不完整导致的。
删除这个文件: F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft\net\minec ...
用你的方法没有解决，但我复制一个mc客户端的1.12.2.json放到F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft\versionJsons\1.12.2.json处就好了
之后还得手算md5放到F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft\versionJsons\1.12.2.json.etag里面
加上之前好像有一个read time out，看起来是下不下来这个文件导致的……
不过还是谢谢

replies.author: 不好取的名
replies.txt_content: 其实可以删除这个文件夹F:\Programs\Gradle\.gradle\caches\minecraft，让它重新生成
